tool_description: The AlpacaImageRandomizerAPI is a versatile and fun API designed to provide developers and users with a delightful collection of randomly generated Alpaca images. Alpacas, known for their adorable appearance and gentle demeanor, have become internet sensations, and this API brings their charm to your fingertips.
name: Alpaca randomize
title: Alpaca randomize

api_list.name: configGenUrl
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://alpaca-randomize.p.rapidapi.com/api/alpaca-gen"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "alpaca-randomize.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://alpaca-randomize.p.rapidapi.com/api/alpaca-gen"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "alpaca-randomize.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
